com.pearsoneduc.ip.gui
Class ViewWithROI

java.lang.Object
  |

                    +--javax.swing.JLabel
                          |
                          +--com.pearsoneduc.ip.gui.ImageView
                                |
                                +--com.pearsoneduc.ip.gui.ViewWithROI
public class ViewWithROI
extends ImageView

A simple image display component that overlays a region of interest, or ROI. The ROI is represented as a coloured rectangular outline. The colour can be modified if desired. The component is repainted whenever the ROI is changed.

Version:
1.1 [1999/06/28]
Author:
Nick Efford
See Also:
BufferedImage, Serialized Form
